beers.name: Wheat Burst
beers.description: A fruity profile with aromas of juicy pineapple and guava. A beer that promises to make any hop lover salivate. The additions of El Dorado and Mosaic hops lend refreshing flavours with minimal bitterness.

beers.name: Ransack the Universe
beers.description: Galaxy, Mosaic, and Citra hops deliver aromas and flavours of tropical fruits, mango and citrus. Light malt body lets the hops shine through, and finishes crisp but not bitter. A delicious, hemispheric hop mashup!

beers.name: The Wolf
beers.description: Pineapple, passionfruit, orange, guava, mango hop character driven by a huge Vic Secret and Citra dry hop. Smooth, full body from Alberta-grown oats and wheat.

beers.name: Belgian White
beers.description: A wheat beer brewed with Valencia orange peel for a subtle sweetness and bright, citrus aroma.

beers.name: Ghost Train
beers.description: Ghost Train won the 2019 Alberta Beer Award Gold in the Stout category! A traditional oatmeal stout and the oatmeal stout blended with coffee

beers.name: IPA
beers.description: Travelling down the tracks from the West Coast comes the Railyard IPA. Stunning floral aromatics, classic orange peel & grapefruit citrus palate & finishes with a hint of pine. Balanced with caramel malt, pouring crystal clear & finishing clean as a train whistling rolling in. This is sure to satisfy.

beers.name: Traditional Ale
beers.description: Toasty malt and sweet caramel up front finishing with a nutty flavour, medium creamy carbonation, and mild hop bitterness.

beers.name: Fall Line
beers.description: Drop in on this steep, flavour-packed IPA bomb straight into big flavour and tropical hops. Double dry hopped with a blend of Yakima Valleyâ€™s Finest hops and fermented with the juice-inducing power of Foggy London yeast; Fall Line follows the ridge between balance and complexity and always goes down fast.

beers.name: St. Joe's Abbey
beers.description: A medium-bodied Abbey style brown ale. Rich, complex, an full with flavours and aromas of sweet dried fruit and toasted malt. The mild alcohol warmth hints at 7% ABV.

beers.name: Mickey's
beers.description: Miller Brewing Company, originating over 160 years ago, brought uncompromising quality and taste to the brewing industry. Our Milwaukee Brewery is the longest standing, large-scale brewery in the United States. Feel our pride when you arrive in Miller Valley.

beers.name: Chromatic
beers.description: After five years of carefully curated offerings, we've finally brought together a fantastic combination of yeast and hops that is sure to strike all the right notes for a fresh take on a West Coast IPA..loads of fruit aroma yet clear, balanced bitterness that evolves on the palate with every sip

beers.name: Branding Beer
beers.description: Moderate in carbonation, this light refreshing blonde ale is smooth and a great outside summer beer.

beers.name: Gentlemen's Stout
beers.description: A rich coffee and semi-sweet chocolate flavor is predominate with a slightly burnt flavour. This is a medium full body stout but not overly filling.

beers.name: IPA
beers.description: A style of ale that was fashioned to survive the long voyage from England to India during the British colonization. Hops, hops, and more hops! Red Betty IPA has an intense aroma and a long lingering finish. A beer for the connoisseur, this is the Brewmaster's choice.

beers.name: Blood Red Sky
beers.description: Blood Red Sky sets a scene. Warm Caribbean sand, flickering candles, cold beer and anticipation of the night to come. From this place came the inspiration for this brew. Jamaican rum barrels meet Scottish red beer in an explosion of cool, spicy rum notes, vanilla and rich fruit.

beers.name: Shotgun Wedding
beers.description: An American style brown ale that starts of like an English brown ale, but finishes off fruity and refreshing.

beers.name: IPA
beers.description: Showcasing the tropical and citrusy aroma of Mosaic hops, this unfiltered IPA delivers a lot of personality, character and flavour. Taking a path less traveled, this newcomer to the IPA arena likes to court your taste buds with its flirty aromatics and its raw, unfiltered approach to big balanced, American style IPAs.

beers.name: Belgian White
beers.description: A wheat beer brewed with Valencia orange peel for a subtle sweetness and bright, citrus aroma.

beers.name: Extra Pale Ale
beers.description: To understand the space this beer occupies in the brewing landscape, all you have to do is walk its boundaries. Begin at the corner that values flavour above all else. Continue to the unmistakable aromas of a great IPA. Keep going until you sense the balance of a pale ale. Then arrive back where you started, and do another lap.

beers.name: St. Joe's Abbey
beers.description: A medium-bodied Abbey style brown ale. Rich, complex, an full with flavours and aromas of sweet dried fruit and toasted malt. The mild alcohol warmth hints at 7% ABV.

beers.name: First Crush
beers.description: Our White IPA gets its refreshing citrus flavours from orange peels and bright North American hops.

beers.name: Mosaic Haze
beers.description: Mosaic Haze is a juicy New England IPA characterized by fruity aromas and a delightfully dense tropical hop flavour. So lose yourself in the haze and let the good times roll.

beers.name: Rhubarb Crisp
beers.description: Tart, Creamy, Dessert, Delicious
